title: Inside eXp World: Why This Virtual Office Crushes Traditional Brokerages
excerpt: Key Points 24/7 Support: Instant access to brokers, tech help, and Luna (AI assistant) for quick answers anytime. Virtual 3D Hub: A browser-based workspace for…
content:
Key Points

  • 24/7 Support: Instant access to brokers, tech help, and Luna (AI assistant) for quick answers anytime.
  • Virtual 3D Hub: A browser-based workspace for meetings, training, and client interactions—no physical office needed.
  • Global Network: Collaborate with 85,000+ agents worldwide, with real-time translation for seamless communication.
  • Custom Avatars/Offices: Personalize your virtual presence and design branded meeting spaces.
  • Live Training & Tools: 50+ weekly sessions, on-demand courses, and free tools (CRM, marketing).
  • Mobile Access: Full functionality on smartphones/tablets—work from anywhere.

Are you still stuck in the past? Don’t be a real estate dinosaur! Jump into the future with eXp Realty, the disruptor redefining our industry. Packed with cutting-edge tools, eXp is all about boosting your productivity, efficiency, and satisfaction.

And guess what? eXp Realty is always evolving, adding new features to keep you at the top of your game. Take eXp World, for instance – our revolutionary digital office space is now new and improved and accessible right from your web browser! And, yes, eXp Realty is the ONLY brokerage with a digital office metaverse.

Over 87,000 agents globally are tapping into a vivid 3D world from their devices. eXp World is your one-stop hub for everything from support and training to client meetings and strategy sessions with peers.

It’s also the perfect place to relax with a virtual coffee and chat about the big deals. You do all this while networking and expanding your business beyond borders.

Welcome to the future of real estate, where eXp World makes every interaction more efficient and connected. Curious to see how eXp World can transform your real estate game? This blog will be your roadmap for getting around eXp World. Ready to explore? Here’s your handy dandy index:

What’s eXp World?

Quick Start Guide to eXp World
Customize Your Avatar: Show Off Your Style in eXp World
Explore the Terrain: Live Tours
Customize Your Virtual Office for Clients
Ask a Broker, Get an Answer
Agent Support – Get Answers, Grab Opportunities

Explore the Infosphere

Agent Solutions

What is kvCORE?
eXp World Entertainment Options
Community Vibes in eXp World
Mobile Accessibility
Future Innovations
The Future of Real Estate Is Virtual (And Functional)
Frequently Asked Questions

How do I get a free pass to Explore eXp World?
What is eXp World?
How do l learn about eXp World?

What’s eXp World?

Are you feeling somewhat lost because you don’t really understand what eXp World is? Well, you’re in for a treat! eXp World is a revolutionary digital cloud-based world crafted specifically for eXp real estate agents from around the globe.

And, when we say around the globe, we mean it. Supporting eXp’s presence in 27 global locations, the platform features real-time translation through closed captions. This feature ensures effortless communication across borders, allowing everyone to participate and understand discussions fully.

eXp World is engineered for collaboration, learning, and working together and with clients – all from the comfort of your couch. Yes, siree! eXp World leverages virtual reality to transform the real estate business, making your workday faster and smoother.

eXp’s cutting-edge technology supports seamless real-time collaboration, allowing you to share screens, hold meetings, and chat as naturally as if you were in the same room. Communication flows easily with instant messaging, voice chats, and video calls that feel just like face-to-face interactions.

eXp World Benefits

Imagine logging into a cloud-based customized office where you can meet your clients. Imagine getting all your problems solved easily and quickly. Imagine holding team meetings, joining training sessions, or brainstorming with colleagues. And, yes, you are talking to real people in eXp World, not bots!

Imagine easily getting all your issues solved like questions for brokers, transactions and tech issues, questions about eXp Realty programs and partners and so much more!

It’s all there in one location. No need to commute. No need to wait hours to get something resolved. It’s a game-changer for saving both time and money.

Side point. While you can do tons in eXp World – and eXp World is this blog’s topic – if it’s not your thing, no worries. Using eXp World is not mandatory. eXp offers several other connection methods too. For example, you can email your broker or call eXpert Care them 24/7.

eXp Realty is about providing agent choices. That’s just one of the reasons eXp Realty is the largest independent real estate brokerage and the most agent-centric brokerage on the planet. Ok, let’s walk through eXp World together!

Quick Start Guide to eXp World

Navigating eXp World for the first time can feel like stepping into a new universe. Your journey begins with the website address, and clicking “connect. It’s super fast. Once inside eXp World, you’ll be in the “Welcome Area”. A vibrant, virtual landscape will greet you there.

But make no mistake! The first time you enter eXp World, you’ll be in the “Welcome Area”, but once in you can bookmark any place to return directly there when you return. Ahhhh, the power of a web-based experience.

Back to your initial experience when you enter eXp World, it’s easy to check out the space, just click on the screen and move your mouse.

Getting around is also a breeze. Move forward and backward with your up and down keyboard arrow keys. Change directions with your left and right keyboard arrows. And, if you’d like to move faster, press your keyboard’s shift key to speed up.

Want to chat with someone? Just click the microphone icon to start talking.

Got a question? Ask with the Help button in the lower right, or chat with anyone through the chat button, or ask at the Welcome Desk. Get inside the blue box on the ground so the Welcome Desk staff can hear you. Or, ask Luna.

Customize Your Avatar: Show Off Your Style in eXp World

When you first enter eXp World, you’ll be a robot. But don’t stay basic for long! Personalizing your avatar is fun and also reflects your unique identity or brand. Start your avatar customization by clicking the three bars at the top right. Choose “Profile”, then “Customize Avatar”.

Choose Avatar Type “Human” and then choose all the facets of your look from a variety of hairstyles, outfits, and accessories. Or choose “Android” and stay a robot but pick your color. Or choose “Ready Player Me” to use your picture to create the most life-like reflection of yourself.

Whether channeling your real-life style or creating a brand new persona, personalizing your avatar is all about self-expression. Plus, you can easily switch up your look for different meetings or just to keep things interesting.

Updating your avatar for special events or whenever inspiration hits is quick and enjoyable, ensuring you always make the perfect impression in every virtual interaction.

Explore the Terrain: Live Tours

Now that you’ve chosen your personal look, it’s time to get the lay of the land in eXp World. Head over to the Welcome Area desk and catch one of the live tours offered.

Currently, you can jump into one of those three times each weekday. To discover the times the tours are offered, click on the “eXp Events and Training Calendar”. It’s hard to miss!

Customize Your Virtual Office for Clients

In eXp World, customization extends beyond just avatars. You can style your own virtual office to meet with clients or colleagues! Get started by clicking the three bars at the top right and choosing “Frames”, then “Create Frame”.

Next, name your space and choose an environment from the myriad of choices. Then decorate your walls with images, PDFs, videos, whiteboards, polls, and streaming screens where you can share your webcam or your screen.

When it comes time for meetings, whether they’re one-on-one chats or large group brainstorming sessions, your Frame is a powerhouse. Screen sharing and virtual whiteboards make every meet-up more engaging, allowing you to share documents or hash out ideas on the fly.

You can also explore neighborhoods with clients using 360 photos and Google Street View right within the platform.

eXp World is built to handle any meeting type with ease. Its versatile setup ensures that you can tailor the experience for optimal productivity, no matter the size of your gathering.

Of course, remember that agents can also meet in person at one of the 3000 Regus office business center locations around the globe. So if the virtual office really doesn’t float your boat, eXp has your back. eXp agents can meet in person too, at one of these business lounges – for free, it’s included in your monthly $85 fee.

Ask a Broker, Get an Answer

Need some quick advice or a deep dive on a tricky issue? eXp World is your go-to spot. Here, our brokers are ready to focus entirely on you. Furthermore, brokers are part of the eXp Realty staff. They are not paid from your commissions like at traditional brokerages. Every eXp agent gets the full, undivided attention of our brokers.

To get to your broker, just click “Go To,” then “US Broker Rooms,” select your state, and check-in. A friendly receptionist will guide you straight to the right expert. And guess what? You hardly ever have to wait! It sure beats tracking down the only broker available in a traditional brokerage office.

Pro tip: Bookmark your state’s broker room web URL for direct lightning-fast access to the broker’s office. Super handy!

Agent Support – Get Answers, Grab Opportunities

eXp World is your one-stop shop for all your queries and for discovering new opportunities. Let’s hit “Go To”, then “Agent Support” and explore!

Explore the Infosphere

Beam into the Infosphere at eXp World, where you’ll find a wealth of resources tailored for every aspect of your real estate career. Here you’ll find eXp Luxury, eXp Commercial, and eXp’s Referral Division. There’s also Onboarding, Mentor Program, ICON status, eXp University, eXp Revenos, State-specific resources, and even a video on how to fill out your join eXp Realty application.

Most of what is in Infosphere should be pretty self-explanatory. However, if you’re not on top of all that eXp Realty has to offer, you might not know about our awesome eXp Referrals and eXp Revenos divisions.

What is eXp Revenos?

Revenos is eXp’s engine to bring agents top-quality referrals. The division provides training and certification so you can be the agent awarded business that Revenos does all the work to get. For example, through Revenos you gain corporate transferee clients, bank-owned property clients, ibuyer clients, and more. Moreover, Revenos keeps identifying new referral opportunities for agents.

What is eXp Referrals?

Speaking of referrals, once you have one or give one to another agent, eXp has a referral tool to safeguard and document your referral agreement. In fact, eXp’s Referral tool makes sending and managing referrals straightforward. The tool automatically populates agent details, identifies necessary eSignatures, and ensures all paperwork is handled efficiently from start to finish. All you do is fill that form out and upload it into Skyslope. It’s super easy and quick.

Expert Care

Let’s get back to other eXp World areas for agent support. Take “Expert Care”, for example. Here’s your place to ask all your onboarding or general eXp Realty questions. Expert Care is open 24/7. So you’ll never need to wait to get your questions answered.

Transactions/Expert Care

Here’s another eXp Realty area that is open 24/7. Here you get all your transaction issues resolved. Staff members are ready to help agents with any issue, big or small.

Explore Accounting

And, then there’s “Accounting”. This is where you’ll head for questions or issues with payables, commissions, 1099’s, billing, revenue share, and stock questions. Hey, and if you don’t know what revenue share is, be sure to check out our blog or youtube on the topic. It’ provides a game-changing source of income.

Tech Support Outpost

Ok, and now we get to technical support, worthy of a bit more in-depth information. You see, eXp Realty is known throughout the industry as one of the most innovative technology brokerages. Our agents have access to some of the most powerful technologies in real estate. You’ll want to get to know our top technology tools that will help you successfully navigate eXp Realty and manage your business.

But, when you have a problem with our tech wonders, here’s where you go. Tech Support is open in eXp World from 8 am to 5 pm in all time zones. Go to tech support for your issues with Passport login, eXp Enterprise, Workplace, and more. Don’t know what those are? Here are some short explanations:

What is eXp Passport?

eXp Passport is our single sign-on system. With your eXp Passport account, you can conveniently access many of the applications you typically use through a single, secure sign-on experience.

What is eXp Enterprise?

eXp Enterprise is your personal launch pad for your business. Here you’ll have a dashboard to view your transactions and commissions. You’ll have access to numerous helpful applications like Skyslope, where you’ll easily handle deal paperwork, and eXp’s Marketing Center, where you can quickly customize loads of useful marketing materials. Outside of eXp World, you’re bound to spend most of your time in eXp Enterprise.

What is Workplace?

Workplace, made by Facebook, is an easy-to-use private collaboration platform for just eXp agents and staff. This is where we share best practices, keep up on company news and events, share referrals, and more. And, hey, it’s also another place to ask a question. Just type your question in on the search bar.

Education Opportunities

On to education opportunities in eXp World, there’s a lot! In fact, eXp World is a goldmine for continuous learning, offering over 50 hours of live training every week. These sessions are led by staff, brokers, and eXp’s top-performing ICON agents. The topics range widely, covering everything crucial to the industry.

Access the calendar in the Welcome Area, choose what interests you, and use the link to teleport to the correct room. Once inside, there’s always a method to zoom into the screen for easy viewing. Plus, all training is available on-demand, in case you can’t make a session that interests you.

Bottom line, whether you’re tuning in from across the globe or from the comfort of your home, eXp World brings top-notch training right to your screen.

Agent Solutions

Agent Solutions provides just what you’d expect – solutions to your agent needs. To get an overview “Go To” “Solutions”, then “eXp Solutions EXPO Hall”. Here you’ll see a complete suite of industry-leading vendors, tools, and services that agents can use throughout their real estate journey and can trust as an extension of their team. Let’s look at some of those:

What is kvCORE?

BoldTrail is a #1 ranked real estate agent platform that all eXp Realty agents get as part of their $85 monthly fee. It’s a powerful CRM, that offers, lead generation, a personal IDX website, lead-to-contract management, listing promotion, and more. Agents outside of eXp Realty pay up to $500 a month to get Boldtrail.

What is Utility Connect?

Utility Connect is a free white glove concierge service for your clients who are moving. This will simplify their move and save time and money using Utility Connect’s integrated platform to compare utility providers, get special offers, and connect your client’s essential home services all in one place.

What is eXp Realty Healthcare?

eXp Reality offers a healthcare option where agents save money and reduce risk. Clearwater Benefits offers several healthcare plan options to meet all agent’s unique needs. Agents save an average of $10,000 a year on fixed medical costs and 80% on out-of-pocket costs with Clearwater. Plus, agents have access to one of the largest PPO networks in the country. 

What is eXp’s Making It Rain?

eXp’s Making It Rain is a lead generation program for agents lacking time or expertise to leverage digital ad power. Making it Rain automates digital marketing programs for agents with products built to drive more ad results at a lower cost. Sophisticated advertising made simple!   

What is Curbio?

Curbio is eXp Realty’s solution for fast and reliable pre-listing home updates – like interior renovations, exterior improvements, and staging. No project is too big or too small. eXp agents get free, same-day estimates. Best for agents, you hand over the project to be fully managed by Curbio. Best for your client – they get competitive pricing, sell their home faster and for more, and pay nothing until their home sale closes.

What is eCommission?

eCommission is eXp Realty’s solution to solve agent cash flow gaps between deals by giving you access to your real estate commissions before closing. From top producers to agents just starting out, cash flow ups and downs are common to almost everyone selling real estate, and eCommission has got your back.

Other Solutions

Other eXp Realty agent solutions that you’ll find in eXp World include Success Lending for great lending rates, ExpressOffers & Opendoor for cash offers, Zenlist – to view eXp Exclusives (off-market properties), Property Management – for your clients that need it, and Blended Sense, a media technology platform making top-quality listing productions accessible and reliable for agents and many more.

eXp Commercial

Another place to visit in eXp World is eXp Commercial. While there’s a commercial booth in the Infosphere, eXp Commercial’s significance earns it a dedicated space too. Just hit “Go To” and select “Commercial” to teleport straight there.

Whether you’re looking to expand your knowledge or explore new opportunities in commercial real estate, this specialized area has everything you need to get started and thrive in the bustling commercial sector.

eXp World Entertainment Options

In eXp World, you can flex your creative muscles by crafting anything you envision within a Frame. You’ll set up your entertainment space using the same simple process we described for creating your office space.

These versatile environments offer a unique way to host client appreciation events. Picture guiding your clients through a virtual art gallery or enjoying a live concert together online. It’s a fresh and engaging approach to bring people together, connect with clients, and enhance your professional relationships.

Community Vibes in eXp World

Being a real estate agent can sometimes feel isolating. Enter eXp World – no need to get dressed or get in your car! Just hop online and chat with other agents who are just a click away. Just open your mic and start gabbing.

eXp World is buzzing with agents making connections. It’s a real social mixer without the awkward handshakes. Many eXp agents report that a quick conversation in eXp World led to a great partnership or a successful deal. This virtual world isn’t just about the chats; it’s a goldmine for networking and building real, profitable connections.

Mobile Accessibility

Are you wondering if you can access eXp World’s all-encompassing platform from your phone? No sweat! eXp World’s got you covered with its mobile-friendly setup.

Dive into the action from your smartphone or tablet and snag almost all the features you’d find on the desktop version. Sure, a few bells and whistles might be tweaked to fit your screen, but it’s all about keeping you in the loop seamlessly—whether you’re couch surfing or sealing deals in the streets.

Plus, eXp’s developers are on their toes, pushing updates that dial-up its usability and ensure you’re never left hanging. It’s all about making your mobile real estate hustle as smooth as possible, wherever you might be!

Future Innovations

eXp Realty is always on top of providing the best of the best. Plus, your thoughts and suggestions are super important. eXp World thrives on user feedback, transforming your bright ideas into real-world improvements. So don’t hesitate to speak up—your input might just spark the next big update!

And let’s not forget, eXp Realty isn’t just keeping pace—they’re setting the pace, leading the charge with innovations that leave agents in awe. With a commitment to always push boundaries, eXp World is on track to keep its spot as the premier virtual platform for real estate pros. From smoother navigation to more immersive environments, there’s always something new in the pipeline. Stay tuned, because eXp is all about giving you the cutting-edge tools you need to succeed.

The Future of Real Estate Is Virtual (And Functional)

If the thought of walking into another beige office with flickering fluorescent lights makes your soul sigh, then yeah—eXp World is probably your kind of place. This isn’t just a digital flex; it’s a full-blown upgrade to how real estate agents work, connect, and scale.

From broker access and support that doesn’t ghost you at 5 p.m., eXp World blends the “get it done” hustle with tools that actually help. Whether you’re closing deals in bunny slippers, troubleshooting tech in real time, or customizing your own virtual office that screams “I sell million-dollar listings,” this platform is built for modern agents who want real results without old-school friction.

And remember—this level of innovation doesn’t live in isolation. At eXp, collaboration is more than a buzzword—it’s the engine. And when you plug into a powerhouse sponsor team like Smart Agent Alliance, you’re not just logging in. You’re leveling up. Smart Agent Alliance runs meetings so you can gain passive income. How awesome is that? It’s like free money.  Smart Agent Alliance also gives agents access to:

  • A done-for-your-brand and hosted real estate attraction website
  • Social Agent Academy Pro ($10,500 value) for social media marketing, step by step instructions
  • Weekly coaching sessions with top producers that creates a family-like group connection
  • Customizable lead funnels, email campaigns, and marketing templates
  • And more…

All free for agents who join through the Smart Agent Alliance sponsor line. Learn more about how eXp Realty and Smart Agent Alliance can help you scale your career. Not sure if eXp is the right fit for you? Take this quick quiz to find out if eXp is a good match—especially if support and systems matter to you.

Not sure how passive income grows?  You can play with the numbers using our exp realty revenue share calculator to see how much you could earn. Not sure how to become a real estate agent? We’ve got loads of helpful info on that too.

Frequently Asked Questions

How do I get a free pass to Explore eXp World?

Smart Agent Alliance can provide you with a free pass good for a 2-week period in eXp World. To get set up, email Karrie@SmartAgentAlliance with your full name. Put “eXp World Pass” in the subject line. That’s it! We’ll get back to you with your exclusive pass.

What is eXp World?

eXp World is a cloud-based virtual hub where eXp real estate agents globally collaborate in real-time, streamline queries, stay educated, and meet clients in customized virtual offices with screen sharing and video chats.

How do I navigate the eXp World platform?

Step into eXp World by clicking connect. Navigate effortlessly using keyboard arrows, chat instantly by clicking the microphone, and find speedy answers via the Help button or at the Welcome Desk. Bookmark locations for easy return visits in this vibrant, virtual universe.

Can I engage with other professionals on eXp World?

Yes, eXp World fosters community and socializing through virtual meetups, discussion forums, and live events, making it easy to connect with other real estate professionals globally. eXp World even offers translation features so no one misses anything.

What are the business advantages of using eXp World?

eXp World slashes overhead costs, connects you to a global network of professionals, provides comprehensive training, facilitates broker interaction, and offers customizable virtual offices for client meetings—all in one platform.

What is Luna at eXp Realty?

Luna, eXp Realty’s AI assistant, powered by ChatGPT and GPT-4, offers 24/7 support. In eXp World, tap Chat select “Luna”, and ask anything – policy queries, listing setup help, or immediate issues like a leak during a client walkthrough. Enhance productivity and creativity anytime, anywhere.

How do l learn about eXp World?

Get a free pass and visit the Welcome Area for a live tour. Tours run three times daily during the week. Check the eXp Events and Training Calendar for schedule details and start navigating your new virtual office landscape!
